loans.name: Erkinjon

texts.ru: Эркинжон житель района Кубадиён. Ему 30 лет. У него жена, сын и дочь. Он со своей семьей живет у родителей вместе с братьями и сестрами. В течение 6 лет Эркинжон и вся его семья работают в дехканском хозяйстве (это индивидуальное или коллективное частное хозяйство, в котором выращивают сельскохозяйственную культуру). Дехканское хозяйство Эркинжона состоит из 12 га земельного участка, на котором они выращивают хлопок. Сейчас Эркинжон запрашивает кредит для приобретения минеральных удобрений для урожая хлопка. Он хочет получить хороший урожай и за счет прибыли с продажи открыть продуктовый магазин.
texts.en: Erkinjon lives in the Qubadiyon region. He is 30 years old.  He has a wife, son and daughter. He and his family live with his parents, along with his brothers and sisters. Over the course of six years, Erkinjon and his whole family have been working on a farm (an individual or collective private farm, on which various crops are grown). Erkinjon's farm consists of a 12-hectare plot of land, on which he grows cotton. Erkinjon has asked for a loan in order to buy fertilizer for his cotton crop. He hopes to have a good harvest and use the profit he makes to open a grocery store.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for his cotton crop

loans.name: G.s Ciudad Nueva Group

texts.es:
El joven Juan  es una persona  muy  emprendedora vive con su madre y sus hermanos en una comunidad al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la venta  de  huevos y mininos en vehículo  desde hace más de 7 años. 
Juan el préstamo lo necesita para la compra  de  huevos, bananos, melones y sandias con el crédito  la espera  el aumento de sus ventas debido a que contara con más capital  y  que ofrecer a los clientes que lo visitan  a  diario  y así cubrir sus necesidades.
Juan  al igual que sus compañeros de grupo esperan que mejore su situación económica y que se vea reflejado con esta inversión. 
Juan en unos años sueña con que su negocio  este posicionado como el más grande y  conocido de la zona y poder seguir apoyando a  su familia  a que se convierta en personas de bien  para la sociedad.
Don Fermín su negocio es la  venta  de  pan  desde hace 8 años 
Doña Filomena su negocio es la venta  de tortillas y leña  desde hace 10 años.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Abril  del 2013
texts.en:
Juan is a very enterprising young man. He lives with his mother and siblings in a community in southern Honduras. His business is selling eggs and bananas out of his vehicle. He has been doing this for over seven years. 

Juan needs this loan in order to buy eggs, bananas, melons, and watermelons. He hopes to increase sales with this loan, since he will have more products to offer his daily customers. This will allow him to cover his needs. Juan, as well as his fellow group members, expects his financial situation to improve as a result of this investment.

In a few years, Juan would like his business to have become the largest and most well-known is the area, so that he can continue supporting his family and help them become positive members of society.

Fermín's business is selling bread. He has been doing it for eight years. Filomena's business is selling tortillas and firewood. She has been doing it for ten years.

Choluteca, Honduras –  April, 2013

loans.use: to buy eggs, bananas, melons, and watermelons for his business.

loans.name: Salome

texts.en: Salome is a married woman. She has two children, who both attend school. She describes herself as ambitious. She operates a tailoring shop, where she makes and repairs clothes for customers. Her business is located in a highly populated area. She says her biggest business challenge is a lack of capital for expansion. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more materials for making clothes. Her business goal is to own a big business, within five years. She will use the profits to pay business rent.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah operates a tailoring business. Seasonal demands for clothing like uniforms and such are available all year round. She also does repairs and alterations. Her regular customers are her neighbours and the local community. She earns a minimum of Kes 1,000 in sales every day.

To help her continue operating her business, she is requesting another Kiva loan of Kes 20,000. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more materials like fabric, thread and other items needed in her business.

loans.use: to buy more materials like fabric, thread and other items needed in her business.

loans.name: Byambasuren

texts.en:
Mrs.Byambasuren is 34 years old and lives with her husband and four children in Ger, in Uvs province of Mongolia. Her husband Erdenebaatar works at a local company and helps her to run their business. Her children are aged from three to twelve. Her two sons go to local schools and her younger son and a daughter go to local kindergarten. 

Byambasuren has been producing copper souvenir at home since 2000 in Hovd province. She moved to Uvs province in 2011 and is now starting her copper souvenir business at home again. It is convenient for her to take care of her children and husband at home while she works at home. She is now requesting loan of 6,500,000 MNT to purchase an inventory to restart her own business of copper souvenir production at home. She is a well-experienced, hard-working and talkative person.

loans.use: to purchase an inventory to restart her own business, producing copper souvenirs at home.

loans.name: Mahzuna

texts.ru: Махзуна 27-летняя замужняя женщина с двумя детьми. Она с мужем, сыновьями и родителями мужа проживает в районе Носири Хусрав. Ее свёкор работает учителем в школе, а свекровь в этой же школе работает уборщицей. Сама Махзуна вместе с мужем занимается животноводством в течение двух лет. Она покупает, откармливает и затем перепродает крупнорогатый скот. Сейчас Махзуна запрашивает кредит для закупа 5-голов крупнорогатого скота и их корма. В дальнейшем она планирует увеличить поголовье продаваемого скота.
texts.en: Mahzuna is a 27-year-old married woman with two children. She lives with her husband, sons, and in-laws in the Nosiri Khusrav region. Her father-in-law works as a teacher at a school, and her mother-in-law is a custodian at the same school. Mahzuna and her husband have been raising livestock for two years. She has now requested a loan to buy five head of cattle and feed. In the future, she plans to increase the number of cows she sells.

loans.use: to purchase five head of cattle and feed.

loans.name: Yelba Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Yelba del Carmen vive en un municipio  Managua, se dedica a laborar de técnica quirúrgica, dedicándose a esta labor para el ministerio, desde hace veintinueve años, su estado civil es soltero, es una persona que toda su vida ha trabajado para el bienestar de sus hijos.
 
Doña Yelba Del Carmen se ve en la necesidad de un crédito por eso acudió a la oficina de Ceprodel para realizar un anexo de cuartos, esto lo invertirá en la compra de materiales como: bloque, cemento,  hierro, piedrín, arena,  y mano de obra, de esta manera mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda familiar, efectuando este gran esfuerzo solamente con el apoyo de kiva-ceprodel  para lograr el objetivo a través de este financiamiento.
texts.en:
Yelba del Carmen lives in the town of Managua.  She has worked as a surgical technician for the ministry for 29 years.  She is single and has worked for her whole life for the well-being of her children.

Yelba del Carmen saw the need for a loan and came to the Ceprodel offices to request one to put an addition on her home.  She will use the loan to purchase materials such as blocks, cement, iron, gravel, sand, and pay laborers.  This will allow her to improve the condition of her family home.  She is making this effort only with the suport of Kiva-Ceprodel and it will help her achieve her objectives.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en:
Solomon is from the village of Kinangay Sur, in the municipality of Clarin, in Misamis Occidental Province. He is 35 years old. Solomon is married and has one child. To make a living, he plants and harvests bananas to sell. Solomon has been engaged in this business for 10 years, and he earns 15,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2004, Solomon joined GDMPC. Recently, Solomon requested a loan of 41,500 PHP. He will use the funds to purchase fertilizers, such as manure, and to pay hired labor to plant some new banana plants. He plans to use the additional profit generated from his business, to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, such as manure, and to pay hired labor to plant some new banana plants

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.en:
Eduardo is a fisherman from the town of CPG, Bohol. He is a 49 year old married man and a father of three children. Eduardo has been in the business for more than 15 years now. This is the source of his income. Eduardo is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other items. Through this, he will be able to improve his catch thus giving him more fish to sell in the market. 

In the future, Eduardo hopes of making his business a success and a stable source of his income.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other items.

loans.name: Anorhol

texts.ru: Анорхолу 61 год. У нее есть муж, трое сыновей и одна дочь. Она со своей семьей проживает в районе Кубадиён. Ее муж и дети занимаются сельским хозяйством. Сама Анорхол занимается животноводством уже 4 года. Она покупает, откармливает и перепродает крупнорогатый скот. В ее деятельности конечно помогают муж и дети. Одновременно Анорхол занимается продажей овощей. Кредит берет для купли и продажи крупнорогатого скота. В дальнейшем Анорхол хочет расширить животноводческую деятельность и увеличить поголовье продаваемого скота.
texts.en: Anorhol is 61 years old, married, and has three sons and one daughter. She and her family live in the Qubadiyon region of Tajikistan. Her husband and children perform agricultural work, and she has been raising farm animals for four years. She buys cattle and fattens them to resell, helps her husband and children with their work, and also sells vegetables. She requested this loan to buy additional cattle to resell. In the future, Anorhol wants to expand her business to sell more cattle.

loans.use: to buy and sell cattle

loans.name: Ibragim

texts.ru: Ибрагим трудолюбивый человек. Ему 47 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Его жена не имеет отдельного бизнеса и поэтому Ибрагим является основным кормильцем семьи. Ибрагим более 5 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как картошка, пшеница, кукуруза и другие зерновые культуры. Ибрагиму помогает его жена введение бизнеса. Он имеет трактор МТЗ-80. Он использует трактор для переработки земли. Он работает в 4 сотках земли. Ибрагим должен отремонтировать свой трактор, так как некоторые запчасти сломаны. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки запчастей трактора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Ibragim is a married, hardworking, 47-year-old with five children to educate. His wife does not have a separate business and therefore Ibragim is the family's main breadwinner. He has been in agriculture for more than five years, growing crops such as potatoes, wheat, corn, and other grains. Ibragim has helped introduce his wife to the business. He has tractor which is a model MT3-80. He uses the tractor to work the fields. He works four acres of land. Ibragim has to repair his tractor, as some parts are broken. He has asked for a loan of 3,000 Somoni to buy parts for the tractor. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy parts for tractor repair.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.en:
Manuel is a 43-year-old man. who is married and has three children. He lives in Sebasi, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. To make a living, Manuel owns and operates a farm, harvesting coconuts to sell. He also receives an honorarium, as barangay councilor serving the community, but he never forgets to operate the farm properly.

Now, he is requesting to borrow the amount of 10,000 PHP. He will use it to pay laborers to do weeding maintenance, in order to have a better harvest. In the future, Manuel wants to send all his children to school until they finish their studies.

loans.use: to pay laborers to do weeding maintenance, in order to have a better harvest

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 47 years old and a mother of four children, who are all in school. For the past three years, she has earned a living by selling goods and services from her general store in Mpeketoni, Lamu. She earns a monthly profit of KES 17,000 from this business. 

Alice was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer, and she is applying for her fifth loan now, in the amount of KES 85,000. She will use the loan to purchase additional stock to resell at her store, including sugar, salt, tea leaves, and packets of sweets. She will use the profit from the business to pay school fees, purchase food for the family, and expand the current business. She hopes to own a supermarket in future, so as to improve her family's financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to resell at her store, including sugar, salt, tea leaves, and packets of sweets

loans.name: Ravshan

texts.ru: Равшану 40 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 6 детей. Его жена трудолюбивая женщина, которая занимается воспитанием и не имеет источник дохода. Равшан более 5 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз продукции. Он в основном выращивает кукурузу, рис и пшеницу. Он упорно работает с раннего утра до позднего вечера и довольствует своей работой. Его работа – это кормилец 6 детей. Он знает все тонкости бизнеса и поэтому с легкости справляется с бизнесом. Он планирует улучшить условию проживания, путем ремонта некоторых объектов. Точнее он хочет отремонтировать гараж, который он использует для своей машины. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта гаража. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Ravshan is 40 years old. He's married and takes care of 6 children. His wife is a very hardworking woman who dedicates her time to raising their children, and, therefore, has no source of income other than her husband. Ravshan has made a living by farming for the past 5 years. His main crops are corn, rice, and wheat. He works from early morning to late evening and he enjoys much satisfaction from the fact that his work enables him to provide for his 6 children. He's able to easily accomplish his job because he knows all the nuances of the work involved.

He wants to improve his family's living conditions by repairing several things. Mainly, he wants to fix up the garage where he keeps his car. Ravshan is asking for a loan of 2,000 soms in order to buy all the materials he needs to conduct these repairs. He's hoping for your help.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair a garage.

loans.name: Linda Katherine

texts.es:
La clienta Linda vive en Guayaquil. Ella empezó con su negocio ya que el papá comenzó desde hace mucho tiempo atras con la tienda. Fue entonce que al pasar ya tiempo ella decidió comprarle la tienda de víveres para poder ella sustentar sus gastos y necesidades.   

En la actualidad ella trabaja sola todo el día ella abre a la 07h00 y cierra  a las 19h00pm en la tienda ella  vende carbohidratos, lácteos, bebidas etc. La dificulta de ella en el negocio son los ladrones por lo cual ella tiene que cerrar  temprano la tienda.

Esta casada, su esposo trabaja en las cuatro manzanas de laqueador, no tiene hijos pero está esperando uno. Con el préstamo quiere comprar víveres para la tienda como bebidas, enlatados, confites, carnes etc.  Su sueño es que su papá  tenga una buena vida y que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Linda lives in Guayaquil.  She started with her business because her father had already started the store a long time ago.  As time went by, she decided to buy the grocery store from him so she could cover her expenses and meet her needs.  She currently works alone all day; she opens at 7am and closes at 7pm.  She sells carbohydrates, dairy products, beverages, etc.  Her difficulty is robberies which is why she has to close the store early.

She’s married and her husband works in the Cuatro Manzanas market as a polisher.  She does not have any children but is expecting one.  She wants to use the loan to buy grocery items like beverages, canned goods, sweets, meats, etc. for the store.   Her dream is that her father has a good life and that the business grows.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase perfumes, clothing, furniture, and more.

loans.name: Mamadmuso

texts.ru: Мамадмусо 53 года. Он женат и является отцом троих сыновей. Мамадмусо вместе с семьей проживает в районе Хуросон. В данный момент двое его сыновей находятся на заработках за рубежом. Последние 5 лет Мамадмусо занимается животноводством. Он научился этому делу еще в детстве у своего отца. Село, где живет Мамадмусо расположен у подножие горы и поэтому природа благоприятстсвует здесь разведению скота. Мамадмусо покупает, откармливает и перепродает крупнорогатый скот. Так как скотный рынок находится на расстоянии всего 1 км от его дома, ему не приходится тратить на дорожные расходы. В продвижении деятельности Мамадмусо помогает его семья. Сейчас Мамадмусо запрашивает кредит для закупа 3-х голов крупнорогатого скота с целью дальнейшего откорма и перепродажи.
texts.en: Mamadmuso is 53 years old, married, and has three sons. He and his family live in the Khuroson district. Two of his sons are currently working abroad. For the past five years Mamadmuso has been raising farm animals, a business which he learned from his father as a child. The village where he lives is located at the foot of the mountains, where the environment is favorable for raising cattle, which he buys and fattens up for resale. Because the cattle market is only one kilometer from his home, he does not have to pay for travel expenses. He has requested a loan in order to purchase three head of cattle to raise and resell. By expanding his business, Mamadmuso can help his family.

loans.use: to buy three head of cattle to raise and resell

loans.name: Carla Patricia

texts.es:
El Jicaral es un pueblo, donde existen diversas actividades comerciales, es aquí donde habita la joven Carla Patricia.

Carla Patricia es una madre soltera, cuenta con una hijo bajo su cargo, a duras penas ella mantiene los gastos escolares de su hijo, pero también ve de gran Necesidad, vivir en mejores condiciones en su hogar, después de un día cansada en su empleo es de sus deseo llegar a su hogar a escuchar las noticia, pero para cumplírsele su sueño desea un crédito y se dio cuenta que  Kiva Y Ceprodel financia esta actividad.

Por tal razón solicita a kiva y ceprodel que haga una obra de caridad en ella y que le financie un crédito para la compra de un minicomponente. 

Esto sería de gran necesidad en su hogar ya que Cuenta con una buena salud, su honestidad que esto le permitiría vivir en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Carla Patricia lives in El Jicaral, which is a town that has many different commercial activities.

Carla Patricia is a single mother who has one child in her care.  She works hard to pay her son's school fees, but also sees the need to improve the living conditions in her home.  After a tiring day at work, she wants to come home and listen to the news.  In order to achieve this dream, she realized that a loan from Kiva and Ceprodel would finance this activity.

She is requesting a loan from Kiva and Ceprodel to purchase a small set of speakers.  This will be a necessity for her household since they already have good health and honesty and this will allow them to live in better conditions.

loans.use: to purchase Sony speakers.

loans.name: El Cacique Group

texts.es: Alejandra es originaria de una comunidad cerca de un cerro llamado el cacique, ella pertenece a un grupo de personas que piden créditos a VisiónFund para mejorar sus negocios y así poder mantener a sus familias. Ale como de cariño le dicen tiene 27 años de edad, y estudio hasta el tercer año de secundaria y dice que ya no continuo con sus estudios por falta de capital ya que sus padres ya no pudieron seguir apoyándola, ella tiene dos hijos uno estudia la primaria y tiene un pequeño de 5 meses. Platica que ella se dedica a vender frutas y legumbres en en el mercado municipal, dice que a diario va a surtirse a muy temprana hora a la central de abastos para escoger la mejor fruta y legumbre que no esté mallugada y así pueda terminar temprano de sus ventas, ella vende por bolsitas de aguacate, chiles manzanos, zarzamoras, mango, duraznos y frutas y legumbres de temporada, dice que hace bolsitas porque asi le gana un poco mas, ella anda ofreciendo en una cubeta por toda el mercado y dice que le gusta lo que hace ya que tiene tiempo para su casa y para sus hijos. Platica que su mama es la que la apoya cuidándole los niños y cuando no puede en una mano agarra a uno de sus niño y en la otra su cubeta y en su rebozo pone al pequeño en su espalda y como dice Ale “a vender se ha dicho”. Dice que su sueño es poner un puesto afuera del mercado municipal para ya no andar de un lugar a otro ya que se cansa mucho, dice que ella está pidiendo su crédito para surtir en sus frutas y legumbres de temporada ya que quiere comprar un poco mas y así sus ganancias aumenten para darles a sus pequeños hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Las demás integrantes del grupo se llaman Nemesia, María Cristina, Laura Cecilia, María Teresa, Alicia, Araceli, Jazmín, Belén, María Guadalupe, Alberta, María Guadalupe, Rosalba, Jannet, Patricia, Tatiana y Elisenia, ellas invertirán sus créditos en la compra y venta de frutas y legumbres de temporada, para la compra de alimento para darle a las vacas y sacarles la leche para su venta, compra de pollos para criarlos y venderlos y comprar su comida para estos, para la compra de artículos para surtir tienda de abarrotes y para la compra de insumos para elaborar antojitos mexicanos.
texts.en:
Alejandra is from a community near a hill called El Cacique.  She belongs to a group of people who request loans from VisiónFund to improve their businesses and be able to support their families.

Ale, as she's known affectionately, is 27 years old and studied up to the third year of secondary school.  She says she didn't continue with her studies because she lacked the capital and her parents weren't able to continue supporting her anymore.  She has two children, one in elementary school and one who's five months old.

She says she makes a living selling fruits and vegetables in the town market.  She goes to the distribution center early in the day to stock up by choosing the best produce that's not bruised.  This way she can finish selling early.  She sells by the bag: avocado, Manzano peppers, blackberries, mango, peaches, and seasonal fruits and vegetables.

Making little bags earns her a bit more, she says.  She goes around the market selling from a bucket.  She likes what she does because she has time for her home and her children.  Her mother helps her by taking care of the children, and when she can't, Alejandra takes her child in one hand, her bucket in the other, and her baby in her shawl on her back, and goes out to sell.

Her dream is to set up a stall outside the town market so she won't have to walk from one place to another, which is very tiring.

She says she's requesting her loan to stock up on seasonal fruits and vegetables because she wants to buy a bit more to increase her profits and give her young children a better quality of life.

The other members of the group are Nemesia, María Cristina, Laura Cecilia, María Teresa, Alicia, Araceli, Jazmín, Belén, María Guadalupe, Alberta, María Guadalupe, Rosalba, Jannet, Patricia, Tatiana, and Elisenia.  They'll invest their loans in buying and selling seasonal fruit, buying animal feed and extracting milk to sell, buying chicken feed and chickens to raise and sell, buying groceries for a store, and buying ingredients to make snacks.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Dalelhan

texts.en:
Mr.Dalelhan is 58 years old, and he lives with his wife and son in a small house, in the Hovd province of Mongolia. His wife, Zalihan, is 56 years old. She helps her husband to run their family business, organic vegetable growing and herding cattle for organic dairy production. His son, Huatbek, runs a taxi service in town. Dalelhan and his family are hardworking people. He has been running the organic vegetable business in town since 2006. He is well-experienced and well-known in town.

Dalelhan is now requesting a loan of 5,000,000 MNT. He will use the loan to purchase seeds for the planting season, and a vehicle to cut the transportation cost of his business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for the planting season, and a vehicle to cut the transportation cost of his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase timber

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion is from Kinuman, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. She is 64 years old. Visitacion is a widow and has four children. She plants and harvests corn for sale. To earn additional income, she cooks snacks and sell them in a school near her house. 

Visitacion is requesting a loan of PHP 5,500 which will purchase raw ingredients and seeds for her farm. She plans to use the additional revenue to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients and seeds for her farm

loans.name: Kalsoom's Group

texts.en: Kalsoom lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of 7 children. Her husband owns a jewelery shop.  This is the only source of income for the family. Her husband wants to purchase a variety of jewelery for the shop that includes bangles, necklaces, rings, bracelets. Kalsoom, as a member of 3-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase jewelery for her husband's shop. She is hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for the business..

loans.use: to purchase jewelery for her husband's shop

loans.name: Silvia María

texts.es:
Silvia María es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, casada, madre de ocho hijos solamente una de ellas a su cargo la cual estudia en la universidad que con gran sacrificio con su salario de maestra ha luchado para lograr que su hija se prepare profesionalmente.

Tiene más de veinte años de dedicarse a la labor de maestra en un colegio de la localidad y actualmente atiende el preescolar ya que le gusta tratar sobre todo a los niños de este nivel porque cuenta con mucha paciencia y dedicación.

En este momento tiene la necesidad de un crédito porque se ha sentido mal de salud por tal motivo se presentó a Ceprodel para solicitarlo con el fin de comprar medicamentos y realización de ultrasonidos.

Esto lo hace con la esperanza de mejorar su salud y así poder dar lo mejor en su trabajo y a su familia, ya que depende mucho de su salario para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y su gran sueño es que su hija termine su carrera universitaria.

Agradece a Kiva y Ceprodel por el apoyo que le han brindado ya que estos créditos sirven de mucho a las personas de escasos recursos.

Espera que le sigan apoyando donde quedará eternamente agradecida.
texts.en:
Silvia María is originally from the town of El Sauce. She is married and a mother of eight children, only one of which is currently in her charge and attending university. On a teacher's salary, Silvia has made many sacrifices in order for her daughter to get a higher education. She has been working as a teacher in a local school for over twenty years and is currently teaching preschool because she enjoys working with children at that level. She has lots of patience and dedication.

She currently needs a loan because she has had some health issues. That is why she came to Ceprodel to request a loan, in order to buy medications and get some ultrasounds done.

She is doing this in hopes to improve her health so that she can continue giving her work and her family her best, because she is very dependent on her salary in order to provide for her family. Her great dream is for her daughter to graduate from college.

She is grateful to Kiva and Ceprodel for the support they have given her, because these loans mean a lot to people with limited resources. She hopes to continue receiving this support, and for that she will be eternally grateful.

loans.use: to purchase medications and get ultrasounds.

loans.name: Marvin Alfredo

texts.es:
Achuapa, es un Pequeño Pueblo con muchas características de comercio y agricultura, es aquí donde habita el joven Marvin Alfredo.  

Marvin Alfredo se llama el Joven de 34 años de edad  es soltero, sus principales sueños es llegar a tener su propia viviendita, para así llegar a vivir un futuro mejor. 

Se le presente la oportunidad de conocer a Ceprodel y Kiva por primera vez y se dio cuenta que estos ayudan a este tipo de persona, viendo de gran Necesidad  llegar a obtener su propia vivienda, para esto solicita un crédito para la compra de:  Cemento, arena y pago de Mano de Obra, seria de su grandes sueños empezar a construir una pequeña casa, ya que esto es el comienzo de su vivienda y espera que le sigan financiando más crédito para esta actividad, son de sus sueños tener donde vivir.
texts.en:
Achupa’s a small town with many commercial and agricultural characteristics; this is where young Marvin Alfredo lives.  Marvin Alfredo’s the name of a young 34-year-old single man whose main dream is to someday have his own little house to live in thus attaining a better future.

He’s gotten the opportunity of knowing about Ceprodel and Kiva for the first time and he has realized that they help his type of person.  Seeing the great need of obtaining his own house, he’s asking for a loan to buy cement, sand and to pay labor costs.  It would be his great dream to start building his little house because this would be the beginning of his house and he hopes that he will continue to have more loans financed for this activity; his dream is to have somewhere to live.

loans.use: to buy building supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Amada

texts.en:
Amada, originally from Guatemala, came to the United States 20 years ago. She is a widow, currently living with her daughter, son- in-law and two grandchildren. 

Since her arrival in the United States, she has been working as a housekeeper at various locations. 

In 2004, after building a large base of clients with her cleaning services, she decided to start her own business. Her business  provides housekeeping services and currently employs three full-time workers serving the Washington metropolitan area. 

Over time, the business has grown, and Amada is looking to get a $10,000 loan to purchase more equipment, such as vacuum cleaners, floor polishing machines, carpet cleaners and window cleaners.

loans.use: to purchase more equipment, such as vacuum cleaners, floor polishing machines, carpet cleaners and window cleaners.

loans.name: Tenesha

texts.en:
Tenesha has loved styling hair since she was a little girl. So when it came time to choose a profession, it was clear to her that offering salon services was her calling. A mother of three girls, Tenesha said her hairstyling business provides for her children, and her hairstyling skills are useful for her girls at home.

Through her San Antonio business, Onyx Mobile Beauty Salon, Tenesha offers men and women the latest in hair care and spa services.  The salon on wheels is convenient and comes to clients when they schedule an appointment. Tenesha offers clients styles and cuts for men and women, extensions, braids, spa services, and beard trims, as well as teen spa and beauty packages, and bridal packages for their special days.  

Originally from Michigan, Tenesha continued her mobile hair care services when she moved to Texas. She got her big break when a stranger at a store saw the advertising on her truck and approached her about helping elderly people at nursing homes. 

Tenesha said whether her clients are elderly or teen-aged, she treats everybody with respect and as an individual.

“You have to be patient and gentle with everybody,” Tenesha said. “But with kids you have to move quickly because they lose attention quickly.” 

Tenesha recently came to Accion Texas Inc. when an Accion employee informed her about the great services and loan programs the organization offers.  Tenesha is using her loan to pay for minor repairs on her business’s mobile trailer and to hire three part-time stylists to assist with the upcoming summer months.  Tenesha is accustomed to the increase in business over the summer months due to clients planning summer weddings and other events during warmer weather.  

“I like working with all types of people,” she said.

Along with everyday salon services, Tenesha also offers special pricing packages for groups of six or more.  Packages include a princess inspired teen party, all male spa and haircut party, and bridal party extravaganzas all at reasonable prices.  Each client will be treated to an oasis with the very best massage, pedicure, manicure, and hair style suitable for any occasion. 

She is grateful to have her Accion loan to increase her working capital and hire help during this time.  Tenesha feels special in the sense that she offers a service unlike anything in the community that is both convenient and hip.  The flexibility and convenience she provides her clients has been rewarding for everyone she says.  You can view Tenesha’s latest hair styles and book your appointment at www.onyxmobilebeauty.com

loans.use: to hire summer help

loans.name: Fank

texts.en:
Since Frank was in elementary school he loved music.  His love for music has evolved into his start-up company Trap Boy Enterprise located in Fort Worth, Texas.  Born and raised in Fort Worth he is aware of the music scene and what is current.  He recently started his company with a loan from Accion Texas Inc. and is ready to make beautiful music.

Frank has invested thousands of dollars in his business, and since its inception in May 2013, has hired one full-time employee to assist with the business needs, and purchased the necessary equipment for his performances.  Although Frank experienced a brief struggle to get where he is today, Accion Texas Inc. has made the journey a little easier, he says.  Frank discovered Accion from the Small Business Administration office in the Dallas/Fort Worth area and applied for a $5,450 loan.  After receiving approval, Frank began making additional future plans for his company.

Currently Frank offers his own beats that he produced, emcee services at local clubs and venues around the Fort Worth and Dallas area, and DJs for parties and clubs around his area, too.  Frank is always current on the latest music and entertainment scene to offer his customers the best beats and music around.  

Frank plans to use his loan to advertise, market his services to acquire more performances, hire a part-time employee and perform maintenance on his music-producing machines.  He credits Accion for helping him further his love of music and childhood dream to one day become a famous DJ and music producer.

loans.use: to advertise, market his services, hire a part-time employee and perform maintenance on his music-producing machines.

loans.name: Consolacion

texts.en:
Consolacion is a 48-year-old, married woman from Getafe, Bohol. She has five children.The oldest is 29, while the youngest is just 5 years old. Consolacion is engaged in fishing. She sells fish, sea shells and crabs. She has been fishing for six years. Her husband is a fisherman, as well. 

Consolacion requested a loan of 6,000 PHP, which she will use to buy fishing nets and crab cages. This should improve the volume of their catch. In the future, Consolacion would like to expand her fishing business, to improve their livelihood status, and to finance the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and crab cages

loans.name: Peddy

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 44 year old Peddy from Bulawayo. She is married with five children, four of whom are attending school. She also cares for one dependent. 

Peddy runs a manufacturing business producing bedspreads, seat covers and curtains. The business has been in operation for 4 years. She says the main challenges faced are lack of working capital, and high costs of raw materials. Peddy has requested a loan of $500 to order more cloth fabric and thread to make bedspread covers, curtains and seat covers. 

She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to pay fees for her four children in high school and primary school It will also pay other business expenses and rentals. In the future Peddy plans to open a bigger manufacturing factory as well as a factory shop which will be selling some of the things that she manufactures.

loans.use: to purchase bulk sewing cloth and other material to make bedspreads, curtains, and seat covers

loans.name: Bat-Amgalan

texts.en:
Mr. Bat-Amgalan is 28 years old and lives with his wife and children in Kherlen, an eastern town of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. He has been working at the power station for seven years and his main duties are managing and examining the furnace. Also during the weekends, he renders taxi service to local people. His wife stays at home and looks after their children. The house the family lives in has deteriorated and it needs some serious repair. 

He is requesting a loan of 1500000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, cement, planks, fiberglass and foam. Using those materials, he can return his house to its original state. The renovated house will enable the family to burn less coal, release less pollutants and thereby contribute to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who wants to improve his family's living standard.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Gulushan

texts.ru: Гюлюшан 45 лет, она замужем и мать троих детей, двое из них ходят в школу. Гюлюшан и ее муж работают учителами в школе и получают зарплату. Так как они сами получили высокое образование Гюлюшан очень хотелось чтобы ее дети тоже смогли учится и работать по специальности. Для осуществления свщей мечты 23 года назад она с помощью мужа начала сельскохозаыственный бизнес. Они продают молоко и молочные продукты, баран и овец. Для расширения бизнеса она хочет купить породистую корову с теленком. С этой целью она обратились за кредитом в 2000 АЗН.
texts.en:
Gulushan is 45 years old, married and a mother of three children, two of which currently attend school. Gulushan and her husband make a living as schoolteachers. SInce they both were able to receive a high level of education, Gulushan's dream is that her children, too, will be able to obtain a good education and find a successful job.

In order to fulfill this dream, Gulushan and her husband started a farm 23 years ago. The sell milk, milk products, bulls, and sheep. They're asking for a loan because they want to expand their business by purchasing a purebred cow and a calf.

loans.use: To buy a purebred cow and calf.

loans.name: Gloria Mercedes

texts.es: La señora Gloria, humilde trabajadora habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposo y su pequeña hija, ella es comerciante de frutas y verdura, el trabaja para una empresa privada y entre los dos se ayudan con los gastos del hogar, ella sueña con ver terminada su casa pero siempre tienen diferentes dificultades que les impiden recaudar de una sola vez el dinero, con este nuevo credito comprar Materiales como: Bloques, Cemento. Hierro, etc para continuar con la construccion, Agradece enormemente el apoyo que Afodenic atravez de Fondos Kiva le han brindado
texts.en: Gloria is a modest and hard working woman who lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe with her husband and young daughter. She sells fruits and vegetables and he works in a private company. They support each other together to cover the household expenses. She hopes to finish her home but also has difficulties that keep her from being able to raise all the money at once. With this new loan she will buy materials including cement blocks, cements, iron, etc to continue building. She is very grateful for the support that Afodenic brings her through the support of Kiva funds.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel .

texts.es:
Achuapa, es un Pequeño Pueblo con mucho deseo de superación, se dedica principalmente al comercio y la agricultura, es aquí donde habita Miguel Ángel. 

Miguel Ángel tiene 69 años de edad  Casado, sus principales sueños es llegar a preparar a sus tres hijos, pero también quiere brindarle un mejor techo donde vivir a estos pequeños. 

Se le presento la oportunidad de solicitar un crédito a Ceprodel y Kiva por primera vez y se dio cuenta que estos ayudan a este tipo de persona. 

Por tal Razón esta  solicitando un crédito para la compra de: Cemento, arena ladrillo, seria de sus grandes sueños ampliar un poco más su casa para vivir en mejores condiciones con sus hijos.

Espera que le sigan dando la mano amigable en estos pequeños créditos que tanto ayuda en el desarrollo de la familia con muchos deseos de vivir en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Achuapa’s a little town with a strong drive for improvement.  Its main occupations are commerce and agriculture.  Miguel Ángel lives here.  He’s 69-years-old, married and his main dream is to manage to school his three children but he also wants to provide them with a better roof under which to live.

He was presented with the opportunity of asking Ceprodel and Kiva for his first loan and he realized that they help his type of person.  Because of this, he’s asking for a loan to buy cement, sand and bricks.  

His great dream would be to enlarge his house a little more in order to live with his children in better conditions.  He hopes he will continue to have a friendly hand extended to him with these small loans that are of such help for his family’s development who very much want to live under better conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and bricks.

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón, es un Pequeño Pueblo con muchas características de comercio y agricultura, es aquí donde habita el joven Mario Antonio. 

Mario Antonio se llama el Joven de 24 años de edad  es casada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su esposa se dedica al comercio, cuenta con una pequeña pulpería, con lo poco que ella gana ayuda en el sustento diario de su familia, pero es de sus sueños vivir en una mejor vivienda, brindarle a su hijo un mejor techo.

Se le presente la oportunidad de conocer a Ceprodel y Kiva que estos ayudan a este tipo de persona, viendo de gran Necesidad  mejorar su vivienda, solicita un crédito para la compra de: Cemento, arena y pago de Mano de Obra, seria de sus grandes sueños darle un repello a las paredes de su vivienda por lo que se encuentran deterioradas por fenómenos naturales.
texts.en:
Santa Rosa del Peñón is a small town with many commercial and agricultural characteristics.  This is where young Mario Antonio lives.  Mario Antonio’s the name of this young 24-year-old married man with two children in his care.  His wife’s a merchant and has a small grocery store.  With the little she earns she helps with the family’s daily sustenance but one of his dreams is to live in a better house and provide his son with a better roof.

He’s presented with the opportunity of getting to know Ceprodel and Kiva and to realize that they help his type of person.  Facing the great need of improving his house, he’s asking for a loan to buy cement and sand and to pay labor costs.  It would be among his great dreams to plaster the walls of his house that have been damaged by natural causes.

loans.use: to buy building supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Dominga Francisca

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón un pequeño pueblo, donde existen diversas actividades comerciales, es aquí donde habita la joven Dominga Francisca de 39 años de edad.

Dominga Francisca es una madre soltera, cuenta con dos hijos bajo su cargo, son de sus sueños darle una mejor vida, a duras penas, con lo poco que gana, ella mantiene los gastos de estos dos pequeñitos, pero también ve de gran Necesidad mejorar su vivienda, por tal razón solicita un nuevo financiamiento a Kiva Y Ceprodel para la compra de: Cemento, ladrillo y Arena, con esto cubriría parte de su necesidades. 

Cuenta con una buena salud, su honestidad y su buen record crediticio, que ha permitido llegar a tener su vivienda a través de crédito con Ceprodel y Kiva, estos lo han ayudado mucho a la mejora de su vida.
texts.en:
Santa Rosa del Peñón is a small village where there are various commercial activities. Here lives Dominga Francisca, a young woman of 35.

Dominga Francisca is a single mother and has two children under her responsibility. Her dream is to give them a better life.  With great difficulty, with the small amount she earns, she supports the expenses for these little ones. 

But she also sees a great need to improve her home and for this reason is applying to Kiva and Ceprodel for a new loan to purchase cement, bricks and sand. With this she would cover part of her needs.

She has good health, honesty, and a good credit record, which have allowed her to manage to have a home through credit with Ceprodel and Kiva. These have helped her a great deal in bettering her life.

loans.use: To buy cement, bricks and sand.

loans.name: Darling Pamela

texts.es:
La señora Darling trabaja como profesora en una escuela publica desde hace mas de 10 años, es el sustento de su familia, actualmente esta solicitando este crédito para realizar reparación de techo en su casa de habitación en los dormitorios comprando zinc, madera, clavos y otros materiales.

 se siente muy agradecida por parte de ceprodel que le han podido apoyar por medio de créditos dándole mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Darling has been working as a teacher in a public school for over ten years. This is her family's source of income. She is currently requesting a loan to repair the roof in the bedrooms in her home. She will purchase sheets of zinc, wood, nails, and other materials. 

She is very grateful to Ceprodel, which has been able to help her with loans that have given her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to repair a bedroom.

loans.name: Domingo Leonel

texts.es:
El señor Domingo Leonel, tiene un negocio de venta frutas y verduras de la temporada,  desde hace 5 años para llevar el sustento a su familia.

 Empieza su actividad comercial desde las 4 am y finaliza a las 3 pm realiza esta labor de  lunes a domingo en este mismo horario. 

Don Domingo utilizara el crédito para la compra de plátanos y diferentes frutas de la época, el está sumamente agradecida con ceprodel por el apoyo brindado para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientela.
 
Domingo  es padres de una  hija que está a su cargo y sus sueños son  terminar de realizar mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Domingo Leonel has a business selling seasonal fruits and vegetables. He has been doing this for five years in order to provide for his family. He is open for business from 4:00 am until 3:00 pm, which is his work schedule Monday through Sunday. 

Domingo will use this loan to buy plantains and assorted seasonal fruit. He is very grateful to Ceprodel for the support they have given him in order to satisfy his customers' demand.
 
Domingo has a daughter in his charge and his dream is to finish improving his home.

loans.use: to buy melon, passion fruit, plantains, and pineapple.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes is an associate requesting a special loan from Esperanza's Water Project, which gives associates and members from social groups in any community Esperanza serves this type of loan to help their communities. In this special loan, Mercedes is representing her church from the community of Peralta from the North of Santo Domingo. They (the church) started a water project two years ago, in order to provide purified water to their community inhabitants, delivering the service at a low price but with high quality and the proper standards.

With this loan they want to buy a truck to pick up and distribute the water to sellers and clients all over their community; also to restructure their distribution point where they sterilize gallons, fill bottles with purified water and deliver them to the neighbors that go directly to the business to buy them or sellers that distribute them. By "improve," they mean to buy 5-gallon water bottles and labels, change system pieces, paint walls and other investments.

Mercedes is the pastor in this church and also is in change of the water project called Agua Vida Sana (Water Healthy Lives). In their neighborhood live around 15 thousand people, and their plan is to distribute purified water to 2500 families, at a cost of $0.50 US for a 5-gallon bottle of water. With this, Mercedes said, they want to impact different areas: economic, health, spiritual and many others. This community is an extremely poor area in Santo Domingo with many health problems, potable water scarcity, diseases, pollution, etc. This project is planning to distribute 300 of these bottles for at least 2500 families and businesses daily. This church is committed to starting as many projects as they can to contribute to the development of this community.

Mercedes thanks God, Esperanza Internacional, and all of you for this opportunity. In her name and the name of all of her church members, she thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: To buy a truck, 5-gallon bottles, etc.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
This is Mwanakombo. She is a resident of Likoni, Mombasa. She lives with her partner and they both work hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Mwanakombo operates a food stall. To help her continue her business operations, she requests a KES 20,000 loan. She will utilize the loan to buy additional quantities of products, like meat, rice, vegetables, condiments, and seasonings. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

loans.use: to buy additional quantities of products, like meat, rice, vegetables, condiments, and seasonings.

loans.name: Maria Saturnina

texts.es:
La  Señora  María de 49 años de edad, vive con sus dos nietas en su casa de habitación ubicada en un barrio de San Lorenzo, en la zona sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de ropa de todo tipo como blusas, pantalones, vestidos, etc. 
Doña María sus clientes son amigos y vecinos que a diario visita en toda la comunidad. 
Doña María está solicitando el préstamo  para la compra de material de construcción como cemento, ladrillo, grava, clavos, etc.  Ya que quiere hacer el techo de la pila y el baño ya que los acaba de terminar y el dinero que tenía no le ajusto a comprar todo lo que necesitaba.
Doña María su sueño es poder una tienda grande.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril del 2013
texts.en:
Maria is 49 years old and lives with her two granddaughters at her home in a neighborhood of San Lorenzo, located in southern Honduras. For 10 years she has worked selling all types of clothing: shirts, pants, dresses, etc.  Maria’s customers are her friends and neighbors and everyday they come from all over the community to visit her store. 

Maria is asking for this loan in order to buy construction materials such as cement, bricks, gravel, nails, etc.  She wants to put a roof over her sink and bathroom.  She just finished putting these in but the money that she had wasn’t enough to buy everything she needed.  Maria’s dream is to be able to have a big store.  

San Lorenzo, Honduras – April 2013

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, gravel, nails, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Gulzar

texts.en:
Mr. Gulzar is a 51-year-old, honest man who is working hard to meet his family's needs. His family includes ten children and a housewife. They are living in a remote area of Punjab, Pakistan. 

Gulzar has been running a jewelry shop for 33 years. He is running his business very honestly as a result of which his clients are very happy with his services. 

Gulzar has requested a loan amount of PKR 120,000 to expand his business. He wants to renovate his shop completely and add more space to his shop since the current space is too congested. He would also purchase a modern locker.

loans.use: to expand the jewelry shop business.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es: Doña Trinidad, una madre que en los últimos años ha enfrentado problemas de salud  que ha padecido su familia con los que ha tenido que incurrir en gastos, ella continua trabajando como conserje para una empresa privada, su esposo guarda de seguridad. Con este nuevo crédito espera continuar la mejora de su vivienda que la ha dejado sin concluir debido a las dificultades, comprara laminas de zinc, perlines, bloques arena cemento, para reforzar los materiales que le quedaron de la construcción anterior, con los que hará cambio de techo y subir un poco más la pared, espera ir avanzando poco a poco para vivir en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Doña Trinidad is a mother who has faced some health problems in her family in the last few years that have made her incur additional expenses. She keeps working as a caretaker at a private company and her husband is a security guard. 

She plans to use this new loan to continue to improve her house, which is still unfinished due to the difficulties she has gone through. She will buy zinc layers, iron bars, blocks, sand and cement to reinforce the materials that were left from last construction work. She plans to change the ceiling and make the walls taller, and hopes to make some progress little by little so that they can live under better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy zinc layers, iron bars, blocks, sand and cement.

loans.name: Claudia Iris

texts.es:
En el Municipio de Achuapa una preciosa ciudad dedicada en diferentes actividades ubicada en el departamento de León, la Joven Claudia Iris es conocida como una persona responsable, honesta y dedicada a su trabajo.

Claudia Iris se Llama la Joven de 38 años de edad, casada no tiene hijos, pero piensa en el futuro de su hogar, es nacida y criada en este bello municipio, cuyo salario a duras penas cubre el sustento diario de su casa, se dedica a brindarle su servicio en la alcaldía.
 
Ella estima que en un futuro tendrá un desarrollo en su familia y desea construir un cuarto de madera y ladrillo para ir formando su propio hogar, Dicho crédito lo estará invirtiendo en la compra de Sementó, Arena, Ladrillo.

  Estima que a fines de año su vivienda estará mejor, pero para entonces necesita que Ceprodel y Kiva le brinden este tipo de crédito, de momento solo cuenta con su buena salud, su capacidad de trabajo, y su honradez.
texts.en:
Claudia Iris is known in the town of Achuapa, a beautiful city dedicated to various activities located in León Department, as a responsible, honest person who is devoted to her work.  Claudia Iris is the name of this young 38-year-old married woman.  She has no children but thinks of the future of her home.  She’s born and raised in this beautiful town.  Her salary barely covers daily household expenses.  She works in city hall.

She believes that in future her family will develop and she wants to build a wood and brick room to start forming her own home.  This loan will be used to buy cement, sand and bricks.  She estimates that the house will be better by year’s end but by then she needs Ceprodel and Kiva to grand this type of loan.  For the moment, all she has is her good health, her capacity for work and her honesty.

loans.use: to buy cement and bricks.

loans.name: Mia Group

texts.es: Mía es un grupo pagador, bueno y pequeño que tiene 4 ciclos con su crédito, está conformado por 6 mujeres que luchan por el bienestar de sus familias. Juana es una de sus integrantes, es una mujer casada de 66 años y tiene 1 hijo de 33 años que trabaja; ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos, y productos de belleza por catalogo, inició con el fin de ayudarse económicamente; con el crédito comprara pedidos de productos de belleza y zapatos nuevos para la venta. Juana desea seguir progresando y que su negocio crezca para bien de su familia.
texts.en:
Mia is a small, good group which has had four loans and can be trusted to make loan repayments.  It is made up of six women who work hard for the wellbeing of their families.  

Juana is one of the members of the group.  She is 66 years old, married, and has one child who is 33 years old and works.  Juana works selling shoes and cosmetics by catalog, a job she began doing with the goal of improving herself financially. With this loan, she will pay for orders of cosmetics and new shoes to sell.  Juana wants to continue making progress and to grow her business for the good of her family.

loans.use: to pay for orders of cosmetics and shoes.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.en:
Alejandro, 49 years old, is married and blessed with eight children. 

He's been in the farming business for almost 21 years. He would like to avail himself of a loan amounting to PHP 50,000 to pay for land preparation. His net income from the last cropping was PHP 45,000 for six months. 

He's hoping that his loan request will be granted, so that he can utilize it properly in his agricultural business.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation.

loans.name: Nashirumbi

texts.en: This is Nashirumbi. The previous loan she borrowed helped her in her business since she was able to buy more products, which enabled her to earn a higher income. It also helped in the family's household expenditures and with her children's education fees. In addition to her fruit and vegetable selling business, she also has a food stall and an apartment. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday expenses.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Maritza De La Concepcion

texts.es: La señora Maritza habita junto a su familia en el municipio de Ticuantepe, ella es comerciante desde hace mas de 5 años ya que su esposo es agricultor y cosechan piña y pitahaya, ella aprovecha los cultivos para comercializarlo, con los creditos anterior a podido levantar su casa per actualmente requiere comprar materiales para darle un acabado, con este credito comprara materiales como: Cemento, Arena, Zinc, Perlines, etc. Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic en conjunto a Fondos Kiva le han brindado.
texts.en: Maritza lives with her family in Ticuantepe.  She has been a merchant for more than five years and her husband is a farmer who raises pineapple and pitahaya and she sells them.  She used the money from the previous loan to build her house and she needs to buy materials to finish it.  She will use the money from this loan to buy building materials such as cement, sand, zinc metal sheeting, iron bars, etc.  She is grateful for the support from Afodenic, and for the funds that Kiva has provided.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Mirna Judith

texts.es:
La señora Mirna se dedica al comercio, su fuente principal de ingresos proviene de la venta de medicinas en general, es enfermera de oficio y gracias a esto atiende gran cantidad de pacientes.
Doña Mirna es muy trabajadora y dedicada a su negocio, mismo que realiza desde hace 20 años, entre algunas actividades que realiza son saturaciones, atención a heridos y partos, en algunas ocasiones atiende de manera ambulante, en las diferentes comunidades donde no existen centros de salud.
Doña Mirna está solicitando el apoyo del préstamo para la compra de medicinas como antibióticos, inyecciones, gasas, pastillas, etc. para la venta, sueña  con tener una pequeña clínica para darles mejora atención a sus clientes y pacientes.


Danlí, Honduras -  Abril  del 2013
texts.en:
Mirna is a businesswoman. Her principal source of income is the sale of medicines in general; she is a nurse by trade, and so she sees a large number of patients.

Mirna is very hardworking and dedicated to her business, which she has been running for 20 years. Among the activities that she carries out are suturing, attending to injuries and childbirth, and sometimes house calls to attend to patients in communities where there are no health clinics. 

Mirna is requesting the support of a loan to purchase medical supplies like antibiotics, injections, gauze, pills, etc., to sell. She dreams of having a small clinic so she can give better service to her customers and patients.

Danlí, Honduras - April, 2013

loans.use: to purchase antibiotics, injections, gauze, pills, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Mira  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
Mira es un banco comunal que está formado por 7 amigas y vecinas que viven por la parroquia Zhidmad en Cuenca, lugar que goza de mucha vegetación por los campos cultivados y su geografía que nos regalan hermoso paisajes, la actividad principal de esta población es la crianza de animales, la agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca en diferentes actividades. Las socias al igual que toda su gente son personas amables, gentiles y sobre todo muy luchadoras que todos los días trabajan muy duro para darles lo mejor a sus hijos, aun mantienen su cultura y sus tradiciones.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora Clara, se encuentra realizando su tercer crédito a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del banco comunal Mira, le gusta esta forma de créditos ya que son a corto plazo y les ayuda a crecer en sus pequeñas actividades económicas.

La señora Clara tiene 28 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos de 9 y 5 años que estudian en una escuelita de la localidad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus padres con quienes comparten los gastos de la casa.

Doña Clara cuida de sus hijos y trabaja a diario en la dura tarea del campo, cría  cuyes, gallinas, cerdos y ganado del que vende su leche, también se dedica a la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su casa y si existe un sobrante lo vende.

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono para el mejoramiento de sus potreros y también para la compra de alimento para sus animales. 

Su meta es tener más ganado de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Mira is a communal bank comprising seven friends and neighbors who live in the parish of Zhidmad in Cuenca. This area has lush vegetation because of all the farming fields and its geography offers beautiful landscapes. The main activity in this community is raising animals, farming, and many of its residents work different jobs in the city of Cuenca. The members of this group, as well as all of the townspeople, are kind, amiable, and, most of all, fighters who work very hard every day in order to give their children the best. They also still keep their culture and traditions alive. 

Clara is one of the members of this group. She and her friends and fellow members of the Mira communal bank are on their third loan. She likes this type of lending because the loans are short-term and help their small businesses grow. 

Clara is 28 years old and is a single mother. Her two children are ages nine and five, and go to a small local school. She doesn't own a home, which is why she lives in her parents' house and shares household expenses with them. 

Clara takes care of her children and works hard daily in the fields. She raises Guinea pigs, chickens, pigs, and cattle, and sells their milk. She also farms, so whatever she harvests is consumed at home and when there is a surplus she sells it. 

She is going to invest this new loan in purchasing fertilizer in order to improve her pastures, and also in buying feed for her animals. Her goal is to have more and better quality cattle.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and animal feed.

loans.name: Narrang's Group

texts.fr:
Créé le 29 juin 2008 à l’inauguration du banc villageois, ce groupe est composé de femmes qui ont une expérience dans le programme des bancs villageois. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et partageant des liens forts de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Narrang (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée, est âgée de 42 ans et mère de six enfants : deux garçons et quatre filles. Son activité consiste à acheter des produits de consommation courante dans les marchés hebdomadaires pour la revente au village.

Avec son nouveau crédit, elle compte acheter  un sac de riz à 13 000 F CFA, deux sacs d’ognons 20 000 F CFA, des épices et autres condiments pour 10 000 F CFA, cinq litres d’huile de palm. Cette tâche est renouvelable chaque semaine.

Les bénéfices, elle compte les utiliser pour appuyer son mari dans la prise en charges des besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Created on June 29, 2008 at the inauguration of the 'banc villageois', this group is composed of women who have experience in the 'banc villageois' program. They are all from the same village and share strong ties of solidarity and mutual assistance. Their main work is in small-scale commerce.

Ms. Narrang (sitting at the far right in the photo with her hand raised) is the featured borrower of the group. She is married, 42 years old, and a mother of six children: two boys and four girls. Her work involves purchasing typical consumer products at the weekly markets and selling them in the village.

With her new loan, she intends to purchase a sack of rice at 13,000 francs CFA, 2 sacks of onions at 20,000 francs, some spices and other condiments at 10,000 francs, and 5 liters of palm oil. This task may be carried out again each week.

With the profits, she plans on supporting her husband in meeting the needs of the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice, onions, spices, and other condiments, and palm oil each week

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university tuition for his son.

loans.name: Elías

texts.es:
San Sebastián de yali  un municipio que está ubicado en la parte norte del departamento de Jinotega, identificado  por su área boscosa y muchas especies de orquídeas con un terreno apto para café y hortalizas. En una comunidad aledaña conocida como el gorrión, Vive el señor Elías, con su esposa y sus tres hijos al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios, él de profesión, agricultor en el área de café, es conocido  como una persona honesta y trabajadora con más de 20 años de experiencia.

Su propiedad tiene un área de 8 manzanas de extensión todas aptas para cultivo de café siendo una área boscosa 

Recientemente visitó a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para compra de abono, fungicidas, foliares y gastos en mano de obra para darle mantenimiento a su café donde piensa salir beneficiado.

 El impacto y beneficios que tendrá  él y su familia son de una forma positiva ya que trabaja su finca a través de este rubro cada año,  mejorando su nivel de vida y condiciones económicas con los ingresos obtenidos en cada cosecha realizada.
texts.en:
San Sebastián de Yali is a municipality located in the north of the Jinotega department and known for its forests, its orchid species and its land suitable for coffee and vegetables. Elías lives in a neighbor community called El Gorrión with his wife and three children, whom he needs to support and provide study opportunities. He is a professional coffee farmer and known for being honest and hardworking and for having over 20 years of experience. His land extends as far as 8 blocks and, being a wooded area, it is entirely suitable for coffee cultivation. 

He recently visited Ceprodel and requested this loan to buy fertilizer, fungicide and foliar fertilizer, and to cover labor costs to maintain the coffee. He believes this will be beneficial. The impact and benefits for him and his family will be positive given that he will improve their quality of life and financial conditions with the income obtained from each harvest.

loans.use: to buy supplies, such as fertilizer, fungicide and foliar fertilizer, and to cover labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy material for his business.

loans.name: Martha Azucena

texts.es:
Doña Martha Azucena es una profesora con más de veinte años de experiencia originaria del municipio de El Sauce donde ha vivido toda su vida. 

A pesar de no ser casada tiene a su cargo tres hijos los cuales los ha criado con su esfuerzo propio y gracias a su trabajo al igual es ella quien cuida a su madre. Es una mujer trabajadora, luchadora conocida por su buen carisma en el pueblo y por ser una excelente maestra.

En la actualidad está solicitando un crédito en Ceprodel y pide de corazón a los inversionistas de Kiva que apoyen su solicitud porque es para mejorar la salud de su hermana, la cual accidentalmente se cayó y se fracturó una rodilla. 

Con este préstamo pretende asumir los gastos en pasaje, consultas médicas y compra de medicamentos, por lo que con su salario no puede cubrir todos estos gastos.
texts.en:
Martha Azucena, a teacher with more than 20 years of experience, was born in the city of El Sauce, where she has lived all her life. Although she is not married, she has raised her three children and taken care of her mother through her efforts and work. She is hardworking, charismatic, and regarded as an excellent teacher in her community. 

She is applying for a loan with Ceprodel and asks from her heart that Kiva lenders support her request because the goal is to improve her sister's health. Her sister fell and fractured her knee. Martha Azucena will use this loan to pay for travel, medicine, and medical appointments, costs she cannot cover from her wages.

loans.use: to pay for travel, medicine, and medical appointments.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Arca De Noe Group

texts.es:
El  banco comunal el Arca de Noe está conformado por ocho mujeres madres solteras con 20 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarias del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de norte del país. Se caracterizan por ser mujeres trabajadoras, responsables con ganas de superación personal. Que lucha día a día para bríndales un futuro mejor a sus hijos. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos se vieron obligadas a trabajar desde temprana edad. Y no pudieron estudiar.
Gladys es la coordinadora del banco comunal El Arca de Noé y tiene por actividad económica la venta de comida corriente como carne tapada, indio viejo, arroz aguado, carne asada, frijoles blancos,  maduros, queso frito, pollo asada, frito, en caldio. Ella dedica a su actividad unas 8 horas diarias preparando y ofreciendo comida  en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y comprar granos básicos para elaborar su comida, y en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El banco comunal EL Arca de Noé agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan  a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno
texts.en:
The “Arca de Noé” (Noah’s Ark) communal bank consists of 8 single mothers with 20 children in their care.  They are from El Sauce which is a place located in the north of the country.  They are noted for being hardworking, responsible women who very much want to improve personally.  They strive daily to provide their children with a better future.  Sadly, owing to the lack of economic resources they were obliged to start working at a very young age and were unable to attend school.

Glady’s is the Arca de Noé coordinator.  Her economic activity is selling traditional home-cooked dishes like meat and vegetables, ‘indio viejo’ [corn-based stew], rice, grilled meat, white beans, fried plantain, fried cheese, grilled and fried chicken and chicken soup.  She spends about 8 hours daily preparing and selling food from home.  The objective of the loan is to invest in working capital and to buy basic grains needed to prepare her dishes so in a not too distant future to earn better income.  

The Arca de Noé communal bank thanks Kiva lenders who provide for people of scarce resources and to poor countries like Nicaragua so they can have a way to earn a livelihood with dignity.

loans.use: to buy food preparation ingredients.

loans.name: Tariq

texts.en:
Tariq is a 44-year-old, honest, hardworking businessman. He has four children and a wife, and they all live happily and peacefully in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Tariq has been running a cloth shop for 22 years. All the people in his area know him very well and are satisfied with his services.

Tariq has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. He has a limited stock to offer his customers. With the loan he would buy a variety of new fabrics to sell, and this would increase his sales. Tariq wants a bright future for his children. With the help of this loan, he could expand his business, and his net income and savings would also be increased. After getting the profit, he would pay the educational expenses of his children. Tariq is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a variety of new fabrics to sell at his shop

loans.name: Tungalagtuya

texts.en:
Mrs. Tungalagtuya, 46 years old, lives with her husband and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. She has been selling clothes at a trade center, renting a stall there, for ten years. In that time, she has accumulated a vast amount of experience. Her husband works at a private business entity. Her daughter is a third-year student at university, and she will graduate next year.

Tungalagtuya is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT. She will use it to expand her business, by purchasing various kinds of clothing from China at low prices and renting an additional sales stall next to her existing one. As a result, her business income will increase, and at the same time, her family's living standard will improve. The borrower is a very hardworking individual, who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase low-priced clothes from China, and rent an additional sales stall at the trade center

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily, a 31-year-old married woman from Getafe, Bohol, is a mother of three young children ranging in age from three to eight. Emily has been raising pigs for three years, while her husband works as a mason.

Emily has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy pig feeds and supplements to ensure the health of her livestock when they are sold. In the future, she would like to expand her piggery business so she can provide her family with proper diets and finance her children's education.

loans.use: to buy  pig feeds and supplements

loans.name: Mariama Sadio Labo

texts.fr: Madame Mariama Sadio Labo  réside au Sénégal. C’est une femme célibataire qui évolue dans le secteur du commerce  depuis presque un an. Elle s’adonne a la  commercialisation de produits cosmétiques, ce qui lui donne l’opportunité de subvenir aux besoins de ses parents (nourriture et location). Elle est sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC où elle sollicite un prêt de 250.000 francs CFA prévu pour  s’approvisionner en produits cosmétiques  destinés  à la revente. Son objectif est de développer son activité  afin qu’elle parvienne à élargir la gamme de produits pour satisfaire les aspirations de ses clients. Par conséquent, l’augmentation de ses bénéfices lui permettra de rendre meilleur les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Son futur projet consiste à ouvrir une boutique et engager des employés pour son activité commerciale.
texts.en:
Ms. Mariama Sadio Labo lives in Senegal. An unmarried woman working in commerce for nearly a year, she devotes all her time to marketing cosmetic products. This provides her with the opportunity to meet her parents' needs (food and rent). 

She is an associate of a U-IMCEC branch where she is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs CFA for stocking up on cosmetics to sell. Her goal is to develop her business, so that she may expand her range of products on offer and thus satisfy her customers' aspirations. Increasing her profits will enable her to improve her family's food situation as a result. Her future plans include opening a store and hiring employees for her business.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics to resell

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de brosteria,el socio preprara pollos broster con papas fritas,el socio ya tiene 9 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de brosteria.El socio solicita el credito para comprar pollos y papas para cocinar en su brosteria.

 El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: He continues with his business selling Broaster-style chicken.  He prepares Broasted chickens with fried potatoes.  He’s been in business nine years and does very well.  His dream is to expand the Broaster-style chicken shop.  He’s asking for the loan to buy chickens and potatoes to cook in his Broaster-style chicken shop.  He feels grateful for the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy chicken and potatoes.

loans.name: Nicasia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de golosinas,la socia vende galletas,dulces,gaseosas y chocolates,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio,el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar galletas,dulces,gaseosas y chocolates.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: She continues with her business selling snacks.  She sells cookies, candy, soft-drinks and chocolates from place to place.  She works from 8am until 6pm and has been in business 7 years.  Her dream is to have a grocery store.  She’s requesting the loan to buy cookies, candy, soft-drinks and chocolates.  She’s expresses her gratitude by this means to those who share her dream and commits to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy cookies, candy, soft-drinks and chocolates.

loans.name: Sutiava Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Sutiava está conformado por doce integrantes, madres solteras con 20 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Ellas son originarias del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte del país. Estas  mujeres se caracterizan por ser responsables, trabajadoras, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudieron estudiar, y se vieron obligadas a trabajar desde temprana edad. Por lo cual luchan día  a día para bríndales un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
La coordinadora del banco comunal Sutiava, Fania Yudel es la coordinadora, y tiene por actividad económica la venta de  ropa nueva como pantalones, camisas, faldas, ropa interior, sabanas, camisolas, pillamas. Ella dedica a su actividad unas 10 horas diarias ofreciendo su mercadería de forma ambulante, con un bulto de unos 20 kg  ofreciendo su mercadería.
